mapper.select: SELECT r.id, c.name as customerName, c.id as customerId, course.id as courseId, course.name as courseName, m.username as managerName, m.id as managerId FROM `registration` r LEFT JOIN `customer` c ON r.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN course ON course.id = r.perfer_course_id LEFT JOIN `manager` m ON r.manager_id = m.id where c.id = #{id}
